alert.note: Alert for Clay; Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:47PM CDT until July 10 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLAY...NORTHWESTERN OTTER TAIL AND NORTHEASTERN WILKIN COUNTIES... At 147 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lawndale, or 25 miles northwest of Fergus Falls, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pelican Rapids, Erhard, Lake Lida, Maplewood State Park and Edwards. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 18 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
